body.name: TOZO S5 Smart Watch (Answer/Make Calls), 1.43’’ AMOLED Smart Watches for Men Women 100+ Sport Modes Fitness Watch with Blood Oxygen/Sleep/Heart Rate Monitor, IP68 Waterproof Smartwatch Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 26 mins
FREE pickup Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 26 mins
features: [1.43''HD Touch AMOIED Screen] TOZO is committed to bringing consumers better products. We have gone through thousands of tests and research on this newly developed TOZO S5 smart watch, and finally decided to use a 1.43" ultra-high-definition AMOIED screen. Compared with the traditional LCD panel , AMOLED has low energy consumption, the panel emits light independently, make it richer and brighter, and the screen can be clearly seen outdoors during the day.

[Make/Answer Calls & Read Message] With a built-in microphone and speaker, you can easily answer and make calls via Bluetooth without taking out your phone. It also supports messages from Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram and more. Whether you’re in a busy working environment or outdoors, you can always stay in touch with your family and friends.

[Accurate Health Monitoring -Your Health Assistant] TOZO S5 Smart Watch come with a 24 hours heart rate sensor that helps you detect real-time heart rate throughout the day. And it will monitor your sleep status automatically provides comprehensive sleep quality analysis (deep /light /wakeful sleep) in "TOZO" App.

[105 Sports Modes & IP68 Waterproof] TOZO S5 Fitness Watch sports watch offers105 sports modes, including walking, running, cycling, skipping, basketball and so on, to meet the needs of most sports enthusiasts. During your exercise, fitness tracker will record your data like heart rate, steps, calories burned, distance and active hours in real time in "TOZO" App, with IP68 waterproof, it won't be damaged even when exercising.

[Widely Compatible & Long-Battery Life] Work seamlessly with iOS or Android smartphones. Equipped with a powerful 300mAh battery that provides an impressive 7-10 days of continuous usage on default settings.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Innovation Meets Elegance TOZO S5 is designed to seamlessly integrate into your professional lifestyle. Elevate your business with a timepiece that keeps you connected and complements your style. High-Strength Metal Frame Crafted with precision, the high-strength metal frame not only ensures durability but also accentuates the watch's refined aesthetics. It's a perfect marriage of strength and style. Thinner Bezel, More Screen Dive into a stunning visual experience with a 1.43'' AMOLED display featuring 326 PPI and a resolution of 466*466. The slim bezel enhances the screen space, providing a captivating viewing experience. Up to 30 Days of Battery Life Go the distance. The watch boasts an extended 30-day battery life, ensuring it keeps up with your active lifestyle without frequent recharging.

Distance Tracking for Running Whether you're a seasoned runner or just getting started, the watch accurately tracks your running distances, making every step count towards your fitness goals. Step Counting for Hiking Hiking enthusiasts rejoice. The watch goes beyond step counting, providing specialized tracking tailored for your hiking adventures. Stay on top of your trekking milestones effortlessly. Track Your Fitness Journey Advanced sports data tracking provides real-time insights into your calorie expenditure during workouts. Stay motivated as you conquer your fitness goals! Precision in Motion Monitor your cycling performance with detailed data on distance covered and pace achieved. Let the watch be your guide to a more informed and efficient biking experience. Stay Active, Stay Healthy Intelligent reminders keep you on your feet with timely alerts encouraging you to stand up and move. Break the sedentary cycle and embrace a healthier, more active lifestyle effortlessly.

Previous page Enhance Your Sleep Quality The watch offers advanced sleep tracking, providing detailed insights into your sleep patterns. Expert Heart Rate Tracking Real-time heart rate monitoring keeps you informed about your cardiovascular health. Continuous SpO2 Monitoring For a holistic health picture, the watch continuously monitors blood oxygen levels. App Packed with Features Beyond the device, an intuitive app awaits. It's your digital companion for managing health metrics. Next page 1 Advanced Sleep Tracking 2 Real-time Monitoring 3 Blood Oxygen Saturation 4 Useful App

Handy Bluetooth Calling Stay connected effortlessly. The watch supports Bluetooth calling, keeping you in touch with loved ones without reaching for your phone. Special Attention to Health Tailored features provide insights into menstrual cycles and pregnancy, along with valuable advice on fitness and nutrition. Step out with Confidence Be prepared for any weather. The watch keeps you updated with real-time weather forecasts, ensuring you step out with confidence. Manage Your Schedule Never miss a beat. Set customizable reminders for appointments, hydration, or any daily task, keeping you organized and on track.

Listen Without Limits Your wrist, your playlist. Seamlessly control your music playback directly from the watch, ensuring your favorite tunes are always within reach. Seamless Communication Stay in the loop without glancing at your phone. Smart notifications inform you about calls, messages, and app alerts right on your wrist. Up to 30 Days of Battery Life Go the distance. The watch boasts an extended 30-day battery life, ensuring it keeps up with your active lifestyle without frequent recharging. Various Watch Faces Choose from a vast collection of watch faces, allowing you to match your watch to your mood and style effortlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The watch has a nice large face and easy to use touch screen with side buttons. Looks very stylish and does most everything apple or Samsung watches do. As always, great for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fashionable watch with cool apps!
reviews.reviewText: Snagging this smartwatch on sale for around$55 was a game-changer. It has a sleek design, responsive touchscreen, and customizable watch faces, it delivers a premium feel because of its metal and glass finish. Its robust health and fitness tracking, seamless smartphone sync, and impressive battery life make it a standout at a fraction of the cost in comparison to other watches like samsung. With smart notifications and an intuitive interface, this smartwatch proves that you can get top-notch features without breaking the bank. This is definitely a great deal. I recommend trying it for yourself. If you are not satisfied, the tozo support will Definetly help to fix that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars UPDATE: (A Smart Watch that seems to have trouble with most basic function, counting steps)
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: --- 3 days after receiving replacement--- I have run more rigorous testing, this time on the new replacement Tozo 5 received. As far as step counting is concerned I and thoroughly disenchanted with the watch. This from a company that I believe is produces outstanding products (I own several of their NC ear buds and the S4 Smart Watch). The step counter is just horrible! In my latest test I wore the S5 and my Samsung Watch 4 for an entire day to see exactly how far off their steps counts would be. Result: Samsung Watch 4: 13,513 Tozo S5: 11,481 which is the same difference I'd seen with my original S5, about a 15% undercount. Why does this matter (for me)? I am on a heath care plan that actually pays me to remain fit. It keeps track of my step counts to do this so a significant and regular undercount means something to me (although I am also a 'statistics' kind of guy, I love to compare how I do over the course time). So this Smart Watch fails pretty miserably. Is it because the Samsung Watch over counts? Nope, I can count my steps in short bursts and the Samsung Watch is pretty accurate but in many of those cases the Tozo S5 will show literally ZERO steps taken! The S4 I have is much better than the S5 in that regard as well, although not 100% but still close enough. OTHER THAN THE STEP COUNTER: The watch is first class. I reiterate, it is a great watch. Very good battery life, nice large and bright screen, everything one would want in a great ignore-the step-counter- watch. Perhaps I have special needs but regardless of those it's important one is aware of this shortcoming. TOZO: probably mostly in your code (algorithm) since the accelerometer is picking things up? Watch needs an update! --------------------------- Original Review ----------------------------------This is a preliminary review but it is being written out of frustration. I received the Tozo S5 1 day ago, charged it up, loaded the app on my phone and carried on with my normal day. I immediately noticed there was a problem, no steps were being registered. This is one of the primary reasons I purchased the watch, to track steps and my exercise walks. I called for support and of course Amazon agreed to accept the return and ship out a replacement, we both concluded that the step sensor was defective. However, after wearing the watch for a couple of hours I now noticed a step count. I assumed, no doubt incorrectly, that the watch wasn't defective and perhaps something 'activated' the step sensor. I cancelled the replacement. However, something was not right. The count seemed low so I decided on a course of action. I planned on comparing step counts across 2 watches. Day 2: after setting aside 2 watches - Tozo S5 and Samsung Watch 4 for the night, I woke up and put one on each wrist. I'm now one hour into the morning and my S5 has registered 138 steps, the Samsung Watch 4 at 245 steps. With that in mind I've just put on my Tozo S4 and walked around my living room. Samsung Watch 4 added 17 steps, Tozo S4 shows 17 steps and Tozo S5 'mysteriously' added 16 steps. Totally unacceptable! So I am awaiting a new Tozo S5 and will try it out when it arrives to see if the first one is defective. I'm a bit skeptical but will update this review once it has arrived and been tested. In the meantime this has to get 1 star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Inexpensive Smartwatch
reviews.reviewText: I had never used a smartwatch before, so I didn't want to commit to an expensive Apple watch. I checked out the Tozo S3. It is a fine watch, but it looked like everything else. Also kept having issues with the app not connecting to the watch. I almost gave up on smartwatches until I found the S5. What a great watch. The display is amazing. It also gives you access to way more apps and notifications that the previous watch. There is a bit more for me to learn, but I am having fun figuring it out. Would recommend if you are looking for a great smartwatch, but don't want to break the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Sleek Smart Watch
reviews.reviewText: The sleek round watch with the classic black gold analogue watch looked so classically elegant and luxurious. In my opinion, much more attractive and manly than the faddish square/rectangular smart watches.It had all the same features of the other smart watches in the market and the useful apps.The price is unbelievably affordable whilst giving features that match watches 4-5 times in price.Truly value for money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sleek watch
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The S5 watch arrived in a stylish package, impressively sleek. The touchscreen functionality is smooth, offering an intuitive interface. Overall, it strikes a balanced blend of design and practicality, making it a worthwhile addition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am a fan of TOZO products
reviews.reviewText: I have used other tozo products and can proudly boast that they are value for money. I bumped around this watch while going through S4 and surprisingly this is what I was looking for. A round dial with big amoled screen is a steal at this price. There are plenty of watch faces in the app and call and notifications are on point. If you want you stand out of the crowd wihout breaking the bank, then this is it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband has been loving this watch! He has been wearing it every day to track his steps and calories and every night to track his sleep. He has particularly enjoyed viewing his heart rates during his sleep cycle.I love that the watch face is easily customizable with different traditional watch faces or with digital clocks and photos.The band and face of the watch feel very high quality and look like they will hold up nicely to consistent use. If you're on the fence about this watch just buy it!
